languages.text: {n}Тьму разгоняет луч света — блик на зазубренном скальпеле в руке Тервантьяса. Гемункул брезгливо ухмыляется.{/n} "Я могу швырять тебя по ту и эту сторону смерти сколько пожелаю. Но не думаю, что повторная твоя реанимация будет мне столь же интересна, так что не рискуй напрасно, вызывая мой гнев".

{n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."
languages.original_text: {n}Тьму разгоняет луч света — блик на зазубренном скальпеле в руке Тервантьяса. Гемункул брезгливо ухмыляется.{/n} "Я могу швырять тебя по ту и эту сторону смерти сколько пожелаю. Но не думаю, что повторная твоя реанимация будет мне столь же интересна, так что не рискуй напрасно, вызывая мой гнев".

traits.locale_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other and back for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

{n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other and back for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

{n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

{n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

languages.text: {n}闇は光によって払拭された…テルヴァンティアスの手にあるメスの輝きによって。ハモンキュラスは歪んだ笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「私は思うがままに、お前を生死の境で弄ぶことができる。だが、再びお前を蘇らせることが、これほどに愉快なことであるかは疑問だ。私の不興を買わないようにすることだな」
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}闇は光によって払拭された…テルヴァンティアスの手にあるメスの輝きによって。ハモンキュラスは歪んだ笑みをあなたに向ける。{/n}「私は思うがままに、お前を生死の境で弄ぶことができる。だが、再びお前を蘇らせることが、これほどに愉快なことであるかは疑問だ。私の不興を買わないようにすることだな」

languages.text: {n}一道亮光驱散了黑暗，那是特万提亚斯手中闪闪发光的手术刀。你眼前的血伶人对你露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“只要我愿意，我可以一次又一次地复活你，但总是这么做恐怕并不是很有趣。因此，我建议你不要惹火我。”
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}一道亮光驱散了黑暗，那是特万提亚斯手中闪闪发光的手术刀。你眼前的血伶人对你露出了扭曲的微笑。{/n}“只要我愿意，我可以一次又一次地复活你，但总是这么做恐怕并不是很有趣。因此，我建议你不要惹火我。”

languages.text: {n}Les ténèbres sont percées par un filet de lumière... L'éclat du scalpel que tient Tervantias. L'hémoncule vous adresse un sourire en coin.{/n} « Je peux continuer à jouer avec votre mortalité pendant aussi longtemps que je le désire. Mais il sera sans aucun doute très amusant de vous réanimer une fois de plus. Je vous conseille d'éviter de me contrarier. »
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les ténèbres sont percées par un filet de lumière... L'éclat du scalpel que tient Tervantias. L'hémoncule vous adresse un sourire en coin.{/n} « Je peux continuer à jouer avec votre mortalité pendant aussi longtemps que je le désire. Mais il sera sans aucun doute très amusant de vous réanimer une fois de plus. Je vous conseille d'éviter de me contrarier. »

languages.text: {n}La oscuridad se disipa por un destello de luz, el reflejo del bisturí en manos de Tervantias. El Hemónculo te ofrece una sonrisa retorcida.{/n} «Puedo enviarte de un lado a otro de la muerte tantas veces como me apetezca. Pero dudo que reanimarte por segunda vez sea igual de divertido. Te recomendaría no desagradarme».
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}La oscuridad se disipa por un destello de luz, el reflejo del bisturí en manos de Tervantias. El Hemónculo te ofrece una sonrisa retorcida.{/n} «Puedo enviarte de un lado a otro de la muerte tantas veces como me apetezca. Pero dudo que reanimarte por segunda vez sea igual de divertido. Te recomendaría no desagradarme».

languages.text: {n}Die Dunkelheit wird von einem Lichtschimmer erhellt ... das glänzende Skalpell in Tervantias Hand. Der Haemonculus schenkt dir ein verschlagenes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich kann Euch von einer Seite des Todes auf die andere werfen, solange es mir gefällt. Aber ich bezweifle, dass Eure neuerliche Reanimierung ähnlich amüsant wäre. Ich würde Euch raten, mich nicht zu verärgern."
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Dunkelheit wird von einem Lichtschimmer erhellt ... das glänzende Skalpell in Tervantias Hand. Der Haemonculus schenkt dir ein verschlagenes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich kann Euch von einer Seite des Todes auf die andere werfen, solange es mir gefällt. Aber ich bezweifle, dass Eure neuerliche Reanimierung ähnlich amüsant wäre. Ich würde Euch raten, mich nicht zu verärgern."

languages.text: {n}Karanlık, Tervantias'ın elindeki neşterden çıkan küçük bir ışıkla dağılıyor. Haimonkulus, çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Seni bir ölümden bir diğerine istediğim kadar atıp durabilirim. Oysa sana yeniden hayat vermenin pek de eğlenceli olacağını sanmıyorum. Beni hoşnutsuz etmemeni tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}The darkness is dispelled by a sliver of light — the glinting scalpel in Tervantias's hand. The Haemonculus offers you a crooked smile.{/n} "I can keep tossing you from one side of death to the other for as long as I so desire. But I doubt that reanimating you again will be quite as amusing. I would suggest not incurring my displeasure."

traits.locale_text: {n}Karanlık, Tervantias'ın elindeki neşterden çıkan küçük bir ışıkla dağılıyor. Haimonkulus çarpık bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Seni ölümün bir tarafından diğer tarafına arzuladığım kadar uzun süre atmayı sürdürebilirim ancak sana yeniden hayat vermenin o kadar da eğlenceli olacağından şüpheliyim. Beni hoşnutsuz etmemeni tavsiye ederim."
